mapper.select: select id,name,password,flag,idNum from t_admin where flag=1 and idNum=#{idNum}
mapper.insert: insert into t_admin (id, name, password, flag,idNum) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{idNum})

insert into t_admin
id,
